name: Outline
description: Team knowledge base and wiki (requires PostgreSQL and Redis)

commands.run: docker run -d --name outline --network {{NETWORK_NAME}} -p 3030:3000 -v ~/wsdata/outline/data:/var/lib/outline/data -e SECRET_KEY=homelab-secret-key-change-in-production -e UTILS_SECRET=homelab-utils-secret-change-in-production -e DATABASE_URL=postgres://postgres:{{DATABASE_PASSWORD}}@postgresql:5432/outline -e REDIS_URL=redis://redis:6379 -e URL=http://{{IP}}:3030 -e PORT=3000 outlinewiki/outline:latest
